channel.title: WDW Today
channel.description: Highlighting news and events around Walt Disney World. We offer tips and information on how to best tour the parks of Walt Disney World including unbias touring plans, reviews of attractions, restaurants and resorts. We also feature Walt Disney World experts on the show from your favorite Walt Disney World websites who stop by and lend their expertise to the show. We also cover topics such as saving money, news and changes and answering listener emails.
channel.itunes:author: Stupid Judy Media, LLC
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give us 5 minutes, we will give you the World
channel.itunes:summary: Highlighting news and events around Walt Disney World. We also feature Walt Disney World experts on the show from your favorite Walt Disney World websites who stop by and lend their expertise to the show. We also cover topics such as saving money, news and changes and answering listener emails.
